formatted_address: 5 Straits View, #01-26/27 Marina One East Tower, Singapore 018935
name: The Spot - Singapore

reviews.text: overall we have good experience and the ambience was nice and cosy. We like the service of Ms Leanne. Ms Leanne very attentive,know the menu and ingredients well.

Had a dinner for 2, the service provided by Winnie was great. She gave good recommendations too. The beef tartare and fish was excellent.
Initially had a miscommunication with the use of vouchers, but the staff had excellent service recovery and provided and alternative.

Always enjoy my visits to The Spot be it for drinks only or for food. Good vibes, nice ambience. Food and service are great. Staff are friendly and service efficient. Special shout out to Winnie, who was very attentive and takes initiative to make our dining experience more pleasant. Hiring the right people is indeed more important than training them. I believe that's what makes The Spot such a popular and successful spot!
Food recommendation: Cheese Bread, Crabcake, Lobster Pasta, Scallops.

A hidden gem at Marina One, every dish is surprisingly creative! The best is definitely Toothfish Donabe. Will come back for it! You can buy a bottle from 1855 next door and bring here. No corkage fee.

Great service from Winnie, who noticed that we were celebrating an anniversary and made a sweet surprise happen for us! Head chef was incredibly passionate as well. Excited to see what new menus they have to offer! All the best!!

vicinity: 5 Straits View, #01-26/27 Marina One East Tower, Singapore
